name: Gossip Girls

overview:
Gossip Girls was created back in March of 2003 by a network of girls located in Los Angeles, the Midwest, and New York City that were â€œobsessedâ€ with celebrity gossip, and more so entertainment news in general.

Gossip Girls originally only operated under the URL of celebrity-gossip.net, but after being acquired by Brand Technologies (2006) the brand expanded to include gossipgirls.com. In addition to the expansion of the URLs that the Gossip Girls brand operated under, content production was also improved. Now, hundreds of researched/original articles are produced on a monthly basis, and thousands of the latest pictures are added to go with these stories.

Dedication to quality content has produced hundreds of thousands of loyal users, and exposure to Millions of new readers every month. Gossip Girls services the blog roll enthusiast with celebrity-gossip.net, and the more traditional media reader with gossipgirls.com.
